title: Way Too Kawaii
overview: Yoshitaka Niimi works at the literary editorial department for a major publishing company. He is good at his work, Chief Editor Ryuhei Kashiwazaki tells him to work at fashion magazine Pipin.On the first day of working at Pipin, Yoshitaka Niimi is confused by the different environment. The female staff seem unusual and there's the appearance of stunning fashion models.
